page.title: 03ARABLE FARMING/S.ELKINGTON
page.content: G.& B.Dobson Ltd.cultivate 708hectares in S.Elkington.367-winter wheat,119- barley,101 oil seed rape,21-winter beans,10 spring beans,54-dried peas, 36-spring barley.Herbicide and fungicide sprays used to increase yield but insecticides with extreme caution.Machinery used for all jobs on farm include 4 large and 6 small tractors with attachments,2 combines, 2 round and 1 small baler,2 loaders,a digger,forklift,teleporter,drill, sprayer,spreader,trailers,post-hole borer and knocker,and a rape cutter also used for contract work. 5 farm workers and 1 mechanic employed for arable work. When harvested grain dried and stored on farm or at the local co-operative in Louth.
